languages.text: "В итоге он понял, что тассерций — мощный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}псифокус{/g}. Спустя тысячу проклятых попыток, комбинаций сил, энергий и жертв, Тавриск смог создать из него свою лучшую скульптуру — Алтарь Перемен. Великий артефакт, дверь, ведущую в вечность! Никаких ограничений смертного тела, никаких болезней или травм! Износилась плоть? Просто смени ее на новую. Не понравилась судьба? Выбери ее из тысячи чужих! Уже не просто мечта, а вящее ее воплощение. Бессмертие, заключенное в камне..."

traits.locale_text: "В итоге он понял, что тассерций — мощный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}псифокус{/g}. Спустя тысячу проклятых попыток, комбинаций сил, энергий и жертв, Тавриск смог создать из него свою лучшую скульптуру — Алтарь Перемен. Великий артефакт, дверь, ведущую в вечность! Никаких ограничений смертного тела, никаких болезней или травм! Износилась плоть? Просто смени ее на новую. Не понравилась судьба? Выбери ее из тысячи чужих! Уже не просто мечта, а вящее ее воплощение. Бессмертие, заключенное в камне..."
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor

languages.text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."
languages.original_text: "В итоге он понял, что тассерций — мощный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}псифокус{/g}. Спустя тысячу проклятых попыток, комбинаций сил, энергий и жертв, Тавриск смог создать из него свою лучшую скульптуру — Алтарь Перемен. Великий артефакт, дверь, ведущую в вечность! Уже не просто мечта, а вящее ее воплощение. Бессмертие, заключенное в камне..."

traits.locale_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

"In the end, he realised thassertium was more powerful than any known psy-focus. All that remained was to put together the mineral, Tavrisk's powers, and the ritual I'd seen in my dreams for years. A thousand cursed attempts later, we finally found the right combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims. Our path to eternity. No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just change into new flesh! Not a mere dream anymore but a reality. But then you came along and ruined it all..."

"In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

"In the end, he realised thassertium was more powerful than any known {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, combinations of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk was finally able to create his greatest sculpture yet — the Altar of Change. A glorious artefact, the door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! If you are dissatisfied with your destiny... just choose any one from thousands belonging to others! It was no mere dream anymore, but a reality. Immortality in stone..."

languages.text: “研究结束后，他意识到塔瑟拉水晶是一种非常强大的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}。经过一千次要命的尝试，尝试了无数力量、能量、祭品的组合之后，塔夫瑞克终于创造出了他有生以来最精妙的雕塑——诡变祭坛。这是件光辉灿烂的造物，也是我们通往永生的道路！不再受肉体的限制，没有病痛，不会受伤！要是肉体出了问题……只要换具新的肉身就好了！要是不满足当下的命运？只要从无数人的命运中选择你想要的，互换一下就好了！这一切不再是梦想，已经化为了现实。噢，不朽的雕像……”
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

traits.locale_text: “研究结束后，他意识到塔瑟拉水晶是一种非常强大的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}。经过一千次要命的尝试，尝试了无数力量、能量、祭品的组合之后，塔夫瑞克终于创造出了他有生以来最精妙的雕塑——诡变祭坛。这是件光辉灿烂的造物，也是我们通往永生的道路！不再受肉体的限制，没有病痛，不会受伤！要是肉体出了问题……只要换具新的肉身就好了！要是不满足当下的命运？只要从无数人的命运中选择你想要的，互换一下就好了！这一切不再是梦想，已经化为了现实。噢，不朽的雕像……”

“研究结束后，他意识到，塔瑟拉水晶比任何已知的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}都更加强大。经过一千次要命的尝试，尝试了无数力量、能量、祭品的组合之后，塔夫瑞克终于创造出了他有生以来最精妙的雕塑——诡变祭坛。这是件光辉灿烂的造物，也是我们通往永生的道路！不再受肉体的限制，没有病痛，不会受伤！要是肉体出了问题……只要换具新的肉身就好了！要是不满足当下的命运？只要从无数人的命运中选择你想要的，互换一下就好了！这一切不再是梦想，已经化为了现实。噢，不朽的雕像……”

“研究结束后，他意识到，塔瑟拉水晶比任何已知的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}都更加强大。经过一千次要命的尝试，尝试了无数力量、能量、祭品的组合之后，塔夫瑞克终于创造出了他有生以来最精妙的雕塑——诡变祭坛。这是件光辉灿烂的造物，也是我们通往永生的道路！不再受肉体的限制，没有病痛，不会受伤！要是肉体出了问题……只要换具新的肉身就好了！要是不满足当下的命运？只要从无数人的命运中选择你想要的，互换一下就好了！这一切不再是梦想，已经化为了现实。噢，不朽的雕像……”

languages.text: 「最終的に、彼はタッセリウムが強力な{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}超能力集中{/g}であることに気づいた。千回に及ぶ呪われた試行、パワーとエネルギー、そして生贄の組み合わせの末に、タヴリスクはついに自身最高の彫刻、『変化の祭壇』を創り出したのだ。栄光のアーティファクト、永遠への扉！限りある肉体による制限はない。病もない、怪我もない！肉体が朽ちれば…ただ新しい肉体と交換するだけだ！自分の運命に不満があるなら…数千人の運命の中から好きなものを選べばいい！それはもはや夢ではなく現実だった。石に刻まれた不死…」
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

traits.locale_text: 「最終的に、彼はタッセリウムが強力な{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}超能力集中{/g}であることに気づいた。千回に及ぶ呪われた試行、パワーとエネルギー、そして生贄の組み合わせの末に、タヴリスクはついに自身最高の彫刻、『変化の祭壇』を創り出したのだ。栄光のアーティファクト、永遠への扉！限りある肉体による制限はない。病もない、怪我もない！肉体が朽ちれば…ただ新しい肉体と交換するだけだ！自分の運命に不満があるなら…数千人の運命の中から好きなものを選べばいい！それはもはや夢ではなく現実だった。石に刻まれた不死…」

languages.text: «Al final, comprendió que el thassertio era un poderoso {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}foco psíquico{/g}. Después de un millar de intentos malditos y una combinación de poderes, energías y víctimas sacrificadas, Tavrisk consiguió crear su mejor escultura con él: el Altar del Cambio. Un artefacto magnífico, ¡una puerta a la eternidad! Nos libraremos de las limitaciones impuestas por nuestros cuerpos mortales. ¡No habrá enfermedades ni heridas! Si tu carne se desgasta... ¡puedes cambiarla por otra nueva! ¿No te gusta lo que te ha tocado en la vida? ¡Elige uno de miles! Ya no es un sueño, sino su ejecución perfecta. Inmortalidad en piedra...».
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

Inmortalidad en piedra...».

Después de un millar de intentos malditos y una combinación de poderes, energías y víctimas sacrificadas, Tavrisk consiguió crear su mejor escultura con él: el Altar del Cambio. Si tu carne se desgasta... ¡puedes cambiarla por otra nueva! ¿No te gusta lo que te ha tocado en la vida? ¡Elige uno de miles! Ya no es un sueño, sino su ejecución perfecta. Inmortalidad en piedra...».

«Al final, comprendió que el thassertio era más poderoso que ningún otro {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}foco psíquico{/g} que se conozca. Después de un millar de intentos malditos y una combinación de poderes, energías y víctimas sacrificadas, Tavrisk consiguió crear su mejor escultura con él: el Altar del Cambio. Un artefacto magnífico, ¡una puerta a la eternidad! Nos libraremos de las limitaciones impuestas por nuestros cuerpos mortales. ¡No habrá enfermedades ni heridas! Si tu carne se desgasta... ¡puedes cambiarla por otra nueva! ¿No te gusta lo que te ha tocado en la vida? ¡Elige uno de miles! Ya no es un sueño, sino su ejecución perfecta. Inmortalidad en piedra...».

languages.text: "En sonunda tasertiyumun bilinen herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}ruhsezi odağından{/g} daha kuvvetli olduğunu fark etti. Binlerce lanetli deneme ile güç, enerji ve kurban kombinasyonlarının ardından Tavrisk nihayet en büyük heykeli olan Değişim Sunağı'nı yaratabilmeyi başardı. Sonsuzluğa açılan kapımız olan görkemli bir eserdi bu! Artık ölümlü bedenlerimizin dayattığı sınırlamalar yoktu. Hastalık, yaralanma yoktu! Cildin yıpranmışsa... Yenisiyle değiştirmek yeterliydi! Kaderinden memnun değilsen... Başkalarına ait binlerce kaderden birini seçmek mümkündü! Bu artık bu bir rüya değil, en mükemmel hâliyle vücut bulmuş bir gerçeklikti. Ölümsüzlük, taştaydı..."
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

Binlerce lanetli deneme ile güç, enerji ve kurban kombinasyonlarının ardından Tavrisk nihayet en büyük heykeli olan Değişim Sunağı'nı yaratabilmeyi başardı. Kaderinden memnun değilsen... Başkalarına ait binlerce kaderden birini seçmek mümkündü! Bu artık bu bir rüya değil, en mükemmel hâliyle vücut bulmuş bir gerçeklikti. Ölümsüzlük, taştaydı..."

"En sonunda tasertiyumun bilinen herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}ruhsezi odağından{/g} daha güçlü olduğunu fark etti. Bin lanetli denemenin; güç, enerji ve kurban kombinasyonlarının ardından Tavrisk nihayet en büyük heykeli olan Değişim Sunağı'nı yaratabildi. Sonsuzluğa açılan kapımız olan görkemli bir eserdi bu! Artık ölümlü bedenlerimizin dayattığı sınırlamalar yoktu. Hastalık, yaralanma yoktu! Cildin yıpranmışsa... Yenisiyle değiştirmek yeterliydi! Kaderinden memnun değilsen... Başkalarına ait binlerce kaderden birini seçmek mümkündü! Artık bu bir rüya değildi, gerçekti. Ölümsüzlük taştaydı..."

"En sonunda tasertiyumun bilinen herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}ruhsezi odağından{/g} daha güçlü olduğunu fark etti. Binlerce lanetli deneme ile güç, enerji ve kurban kombinasyonlarının ardından Tavrisk nihayet en büyük heykeli olan Değişim Sunağı'nı yaratabilmeyi başardı. Sonsuzluğa açılan kapımız olan görkemli bir eserdi bu! Artık ölümlü bedenlerimizin dayattığı sınırlamalar yoktu. Hastalık, yaralanma yoktu! Cildin yıpranmışsa... Yenisiyle değiştirmek yeterliydi! Kaderinden memnun değilsen... Başkalarına ait binlerce kaderden birini seçmek mümkündü! Bu artık bu bir rüya değil, en mükemmel hâliyle vücut bulmuş bir gerçeklikti. Ölümsüzlük, taştaydı..."

languages.text: « Il a fini par réaliser que le thassertium est un puissant {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}focalisateur psychique{/g} connu. Après mille tentatives infructueuses, et une combinaison de pouvoirs, d'énergies et de victimes sacrificielles, Tavrisk a réussi à tailler dans ce matériau sa plus belle sculpture, j'ai nommé l'Autel du Changement. Un artefact proprement admirable doublé d'une porte sur l'éternité ! Nous étions délivrés des limites imposées par nos enveloppes mortelles. Plus de maux, plus de blessures ! Lorsque la chair est usée... il suffit d'en changer ! Et, au cas où votre existence vous déplaît, il ne tient qu'à vous d'en choisir une autre parmi les innombrables possibilités qui s'offrent à vous ! Le rêve est devenu réalité, il s'est concrétisé dans toute sa perfection. L'immortalité, gravée dans la pierre... »
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

Après mille tentatives infructueuses, et une combinaison de pouvoirs, d'énergies et de victimes sacrificielles, Tavrisk a réussi à tailler dans ce matériau sa plus belle sculpture, j'ai nommé l'Autel du Changement. Le rêve est devenu réalité, il s'est concrétisé dans toute sa perfection. L'immortalité, gravée dans la pierre... »

« Il a fini par réaliser que le thassertium est plus puissant que n'importe quel {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}focalisateur psychique{/g} connu. Après mille tentatives infructueuses, et une combinaison de pouvoirs, d'énergies et de victimes sacrificielles, Tavrisk a réussi à tailler dans ce matériau sa plus belle sculpture, j'ai nommé l'Autel du Changement. Un artefact proprement admirable doublé d'une porte sur l'éternité ! Nous étions délivrés des limites imposées par nos enveloppes mortelles. Plus de maux, plus de blessures ! Lorsque la chair est usée... il suffit d'en changer ! Et, au cas où votre existence vous déplaît, il ne tient qu'à vous d'en choisir une autre parmi les innombrables possibilités qui s'offrent à vous ! Le rêve est devenu réalité, il s'est concrétisé dans toute sa perfection. L'immortalité, gravée dans la pierre... »

languages.text: "Schließlich hat er erkannt, dass Thassertim ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}Psi-Fokus{/g} ist. Nach tausend verfluchten Versuchen und einer Kombination aus Kräften, Energien und Opfern konnte Tavrisk seine beste Skulptur daraus formen ... den Altar der Veränderung. Ein wunderbares Artefakt. Eine Tür zur Ewigkeit! Keine Einschränkungen unserer sterblichen Leiber mehr. Keine Krankheiten oder Verletzungen! Ist euer Fleisch verschlissen ... holt Euch einfach ein neues! Ihr mögt Euer Schicksal im Leben nicht? Dann wählt aus tausend anderen! Das ist kein Traum mehr, sondern seine perfekte Umsetzung. In Stein gemeißelte Perfektion ..."
languages.original_text: "In the end, he realised thassertium was a potent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g}. After a thousand cursed attempts, and a combination of powers, energies, and sacrificial victims, Tavrisk managed to create his finest sculpture from it — the Altar of Change. A magnificent artefact; a door to eternity! No more limitations imposed by our mortal bodies. No ailments, no injuries! If your flesh is worn... just swap it for new flesh! Don't like your lot in life? Choose from a thousand others! No longer just a dream, but its most perfect realisation. Immortality in stone..."

traits.locale_text: "Schließlich hat er erkannt, dass Thassertim ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}Psi-Fokus{/g} ist. Nach tausend verfluchten Versuchen und einer Kombination aus Kräften, Energien und Opfern konnte Tavrisk seine beste Skulptur daraus formen ... den Altar der Veränderung. Ein wunderbares Artefakt. Eine Tür zur Ewigkeit! Keine Einschränkungen unserer sterblichen Leiber mehr. Keine Krankheiten oder Verletzungen! Ist euer Fleisch verschlissen ... holt Euch einfach ein neues! Ihr mögt Euer Schicksal im Leben nicht? Dann wählt aus tausend anderen! Das ist kein Traum mehr, sondern seine perfekte Umsetzung. In Stein gemeißelte Perfektion ..."

"Am Ende erkannte er, dass Thassertim mächtiger ist als jeder bekannte {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}Psi-Fokus{/g}. Tausend verfluchte Versuche und eine Kombination von Kräften, Energien und Opfern später gelang es Tavrisk, seine beste Skulptur daraus zu formen – den Altar der Veränderung. Ein prächtiges Artefakt, eine Tür zur Ewigkeit! Keine Begrenzungen mehr durch unsere sterblichen Körper. Keine Krankheiten, keine Verletzungen! Wenn das Fleisch verbraucht ist ... wird es einfach gegen neues Fleisch ausgetauscht! Gefällt Euch Euer Los im Leben nicht? Wählt aus tausend anderen! Nicht länger nur ein Traum, sondern dessen perfekte Umsetzung. Unsterblichkeit in Stein ..."
